name: Judy Reed's Fig Preserves
keywords: fig, lemon, sugar, side dish, spring

recipeInstructions.text: Trim stem ends and rinse figs. Put into a heavy-bottomed saucepan with sugar, lemon slices and 1 cup water. Simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, until a thick syrup forms.
Transfer hot figs to 2 sterilized 1-pint Mason-type jars, top with sterilized lids and seal in a hot-water bath according to the jar manufacturer's directions. Cool and store in a dark place.
